snippet: The case concerns nonprofit groups like schools and hospitals that are affiliated with religious organizations, and rules for insurance coverage for contraceptives.
abstract: Supreme Court is set to hear case on whether nonprofit groups affiliated with religious organizations are required to pay health care coverage for employee birth control; case represents second time contraception requirement has been challenged and fourth time court has considered aspect of Affordable Care Act.
lead_paragraph: The case concerns nonprofit groups like schools and hospitals that are affiliated with religious organizations, and rules for insurance coverage for contraceptives.

headline.main: Supreme Court to Hear New Case on Contraception and Religion
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court to Hear Another Case on Contraception and Religion

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
